name.ja: <ruby>再世神<rt>トーラ・リジェネシス</rt></ruby>

text.en: Special Summon 1 "Regenesis" monster from your Deck, but send it to the GY during your opponent's End Phase, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck until the end of the next turn after this card resolves. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your banished "Regenesis" monsters; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Torah Regenesis" once per turn.
